channel.title: Rate my first website
channel.description:
Hi folks
I am pretty new to php and decided todo a basic website as a test to see what I am capable of. I would much appreciate it if you guys could give me some feed back on what you think about it and what I could do to improve my wesbite.
At the moment, the website is hosted off a free hosting company (freehostia) and the theme of the website is based on a server I was working on (RSC). No, this isnt an advertisement, I have disabled some buttons on pupose.
The whole website was build from scratch apart from the background image that was taken off a free background website.
http://xtremepk.freehostia.com/
Comment/rate/hate

item.title: Rate my first website

My bad
What the fuck is wrong with me? Did you look at his website?
[/quote]

that question wasnt directed towards you. it was directed towards OP.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my first website
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:13, topic:326969”]leet codes bro, can i get the client.java[/quote]here u go bro

<html>
	<head>
		<SCRIPT language="JavaScript">
		<!--
			if (document.images) {
				//Play button
				pic1on= new Image();
				pic1on.src="img/img_hover/play_hover.png";  

				pic1off= new Image();
				pic1off.src="img/play.png";
				
				//register button
				pic2on= new Image();
				pic2on.src="img/img_hover/register_hover.png";  

				pic2off= new Image();
				pic2off.src="img/register.png";
				
				//Home button
				pic3on= new Image();
				pic3on.src="img/img_hover/home_hover.png";  

				pic3off= new Image();
				pic3off.src="img/img_hover/home_hover.png";
				
				//Highscores button
				pic4on= new Image();
				pic4on.src="img/img_hover/highscores_hover.png";  

				pic4off= new Image();
				pic4off.src="img/highscores.png";
				
				//Rules button
				pic5on= new Image();
				pic5on.src="img/img_hover/rules_hover.png";  

				pic5off= new Image();
				pic5off.src="img/rules.png";
				
				//Forums button
				pic6on= new Image();
				pic6on.src="img/img_hover/fourms_hover.png";  

				pic6off= new Image();
				pic6off.src="img/fourms.png";
			}	

			function lightup(imgName) {
				if (document.images) {
					imgOn=eval(imgName + "on.src");
					document[imgName].src= imgOn;
				}
			}

			function turnoff(imgName) {
				if (document.images) {
					imgOff=eval(imgName + "off.src");
					document[imgName].src= imgOff;
				}
			}

		//-->
		</SCRIPT>

	<link rel = "stylesheet" type = "text/css" href = "test.css" />
	</head>
	<body>
	<div style= "text-align: center;">
		<div id = "header"> <img alt="image" style="float:relative;margin-left:5px;margin-top: 30px;" src="img/logo.png"/></div>

		<div id = "inner">
		<!--Left Panel -->
			<div id = "left_panel">
				<!--Home Button-->
				<a href="index.php" onMouseover="lightup('pic3')" onMouseout="turnoff('pic3')">
				<img src="img/img_hover/home_hover.png" name="pic3" border="0"> <br/> <br/></a>
				
				<!--Fourms Button-->
				<a href="index.html" onMouseover="lightup('pic6')" onMouseout="turnoff('pic6')">

				<img src="img/fourms.png" name="pic6" border="0"> <br/> <br/></a>
				
				<!--HighScores Button-->
				<a href="highscores.php?show=attack" onMouseover="lightup('pic4')" onMouseout="turnoff('pic4')">
				<img src="img/highscores.png" name="pic4" border="0"> <br/> <br/></a>
				
				<!--Rules Button-->
				<a href="rules.php" onMouseover="lightup('pic5')" onMouseout="turnoff('pic5')">
				<img src="img/rules.png" name="pic5" border="0"> <br/> <br/></a>

			</div>
		<!-- /Left Panel -->
			<div style= "text-align: left;">
				<div id = "play_register" style = "margin-left:255px; margin-top: -295"> 
					<!--Play Button -->
					<a href="index.html" onMouseover="lightup('pic1')" onMouseout="turnoff('pic1')">
					<img src="img/play.png" name="pic1" border="0" style="margin-left:30px; margin-top: 63px;"></a> 
					
					<!-- Register Button -->
					<a href="index.html" onMouseover="lightup('pic2')" onMouseout="turnoff('pic2')">
					<img src="img/register.png" name="pic2" border="0" style="margin-left:55px; margin-top: 63px;"></a> 
				</div> 
				
		<!-- News -->

				<div id = "news_header"> 
					<h1> This is a test heading </h1>
				</div>
				<div id = "news_inner">
					<p> James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk, James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,James likes cawk,
				</div>
				<div id = "news_footer"> 
					<h2> This is a footer </h2>

				</div>
		<!-- 2 -->
				<div id = "news_header"> 
					<h1> This is a test heading </h1>
				</div>
				<div id = "news_inner">
					<p> This is a test paragraph, i hope it extends over and wrapps around =X, alsdkjasldkjasldkajsdlaks jdalksdjalksdjhflaskjdhflaksjdhflaskjdfhalskdjfhalsd kjfhalskdjfhalskdjfhalskdjfhalskj dfhalskdjfhalskdjfhalskdjfhalskdjfhalsk djfhalksdjfh alskjdfhlaksjdfhalskjdhflaksjdhf laksjdhflaksjdhfalks jdfhalksjdfhalskj dfhlaskjdfhalskjdfhalskdj fhalskjdfhlaskjdfhlaskjdhflaskjdhfalskjdhfalskdjfhalksjdfhalskjdfhalskdjfh
				</div>

				<div id = "news_footer"> 
					<h2> This is a footer </h2>
				</div>
		<!-- 3 -->
				<div id = "news_header"> 
					<h1> This is a test heading </h1>
				</div>
				<div id = "news_inner">

					<p> This is a test paragraph, i hope it extends over and wrapps around =X, alsdkjasldkjasldkajsdlaks jdalksdjalksdjhflaskjdhflaksjdhflaskjdfhalskdjfhalsd kjfhalskdjfhalskdjfhalskdjfhalskj dfhalskdjfhalskdjfhalskdjfhalskdjfhalsk djfhalksdjfh alskjdfhlaksjdfhalskjdhflaksjdhf laksjdhflaksjdhfalks jdfhalksjdfhalskj dfhlaskjdfhalskjdfhalskdj fhalskjdfhlaskjdfhlaskjdhflaskjdhfalskjdhfalskdjfhalksjdfhalskjdfhalskdjfh
				</div>
				<div id = "news_footer"> 
					<h2> This is a footer </h2>
				</div>
		<!-- /News -->
			</div>
		</div>

		<div id = "footer"> </div>
	</div>
	</body>
</html>

with added javascripts and comments!

item.title: Rate my first website
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“soul raever, post:9, topic:326969”]Internal Server Error
The server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request.

Please contact the server administrator, support@freehostia.com and inform them of the time the error occurred, and anything you might have done that may have caused the error.

More information about this error may be available in the server error log.

i love your site :)[/quote]
Most likely a temporary shithost error, as it’s working now.
